long_description: The portable and packable Exped Air Seat sit pad provides cushion for your derriere when you're on the trail, at sporting events, or at an outdoor concert. Inflate with a few hearty breaths; features 2 low-profile, FlatValves for inflation and deflation. Soft polyester tricot fabric is comfortable next to skin. Vertical baffles provide stability and strength. Includes stuff sack for protection during transportation; also includes repair kit with adhesive and fabric patches. Packs down to a compact travel size of 3.1 x 5.5 in.
short_description: The portable and packable Exped Air Seat sit pad provides cushion for your derriere when you're on the trail, at sporting events, or at an outdoor concert.
